moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Refresh
moves.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user's environment.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: After You
moves.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

moves.name: Simple Beam
moves.description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.
